name: Data Science Delivery Playbook PRD
description: Collaborative data science workflow covering exploration, feature engineering, model training, and production deployment.

sections.title: Overview
sections.content: A structured process enabling data scientists to explore, prototype, and deploy models with reproducibility and observability.

sections.title: Workflow
sections.content: Notebook experimentation, feature store registration, training pipelines, evaluation, CI/CD promotion, model registry.

sections.title: Governance
sections.content: Dataset lineage, approval gates, responsible AI checklist, monitoring of drift and fairness metrics.

sections.title: Platform Requirements
sections.content: Managed compute, parameter tracking, dataset versioning, automated retraining triggers, alerting.

technology_profile.notes: Emphasis on reproducibility, data contracts, and promotion workflow from staging to production.

api_guidance.name: OpenAI Assistants API
api_guidance.rationale: Augment analyst workflows with code completion and summarisation for notebooks.

api_guidance.name: Weights & Biases API
api_guidance.rationale: Centralized experiment tracking, comparisons, and reports.
